movie.title: Hot Moves
movie.description_intro: Four friends, annoyed at how almost everyone else they know is having sex but them, agree to do what they can to help each other lose their virginity before the end of the summer. Most of their opportunities are foiled by their inexperience and bad planning. Michael, the most sensible boy of the foursome, really just wants to stay with his long-time girlfriend and take their relationship to an intimate level, but after putting him off for six months he grows impatient and splits up with her to seek his fortune elsewhere.
movie.description_full: Four friends, annoyed at how almost everyone else they know is having sex but them, agree to do what they can to help each other lose their virginity before the end of the summer. Most of their opportunities are foiled by their inexperience and bad planning. Michael, the most sensible boy of the foursome, really just wants to stay with his long-time girlfriend and take their relationship to an intimate level, but after putting him off for six months he grows impatient and splits up with her to seek his fortune elsewhere.

movies.title: Albion: The Enchanted Stallion
movies.summary: A twelve-year-old girl is transported by a magical black stallion to the mystical world of ALBION, where she discovers that she alone is the key to saving an entire race of people.
movies.description_full: A twelve-year-old girl is transported by a magical black stallion to the mystical world of ALBION, where she discovers that she alone is the key to saving an entire race of people.
movies.synopsis: A twelve-year-old girl is transported by a magical black stallion to the mystical world of ALBION, where she discovers that she alone is the key to saving an entire race of people.

movies.title: The Extraordinary Journey of the Fakir
movies.title_english: The Extraordinary Journey of the Fakir
movies.title_long: The Extraordinary Journey of the Fakir (2018)
movies.summary: Ajatashatru Lavash Patel has lived all his life in a small Mumbai neighborhood tricking people with street magic and performing as a 'fakir' who can do impossible miracles. After his mother's untimely death, he sets out on a journey to find his father and rise from poverty.
movies.description_full: Ajatashatru Lavash Patel has lived all his life in a small Mumbai neighborhood tricking people with street magic and performing as a 'fakir' who can do impossible miracles. After his mother's untimely death, he sets out on a journey to find his father and rise from poverty.
movies.synopsis: Ajatashatru Lavash Patel has lived all his life in a small Mumbai neighborhood tricking people with street magic and performing as a 'fakir' who can do impossible miracles. After his mother's untimely death, he sets out on a journey to find his father and rise from poverty.

movies.title: Dom and Adrian: 2020
movies.summary: From the creators of Bondi Hipsters, this mockumentary special follows Dom and Adrian who are forced to redefine themselves creatively and philosophically if they're to survive the garbage fire that is 2020.
movies.description_full: From the creators of Bondi Hipsters, this mockumentary special follows Dom and Adrian who are forced to redefine themselves creatively and philosophically if they're to survive the garbage fire that is 2020.
movies.synopsis: From the creators of Bondi Hipsters, this mockumentary special follows Dom and Adrian who are forced to redefine themselves creatively and philosophically if they're to survive the garbage fire that is 2020.

movies.title: Underdog
movies.summary: A bomb-sniffing beagle is fired from the mayor's office for a faux pas. That night a mad scientist dognaps him and injects him with an elixir. The dog escapes, but now has superpowers. He's adopted by a security guard - an ex-cop, who's a widower with a moody teen son, Jack. The boy discovers that the dog, named Shoeshine by dad, has super powers, but it's their little secret. While Underdog saves people in distress, the mad scientist and his underling continue their plot to catch him and take over the city. There's also a girl Jack likes who has a dog that Shoeshine takes a shine to. Will every dog have his day?
